title: IS LAG BUT IS NOT
body: So I have no clue about what it is...My ms that usually are around 40-49 don't go up ( so there are not spike lag or at least it doesn't show up as I have ctrl + F to see my FPS and MS ) yet during game I have little delays . 2 games and 3 of us in each game had the same issue . Any one having the same problem ? RITO are you working on it . Are you aware ? {{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}

replies.body:
Has it only been those 2 particular games recently?  Or has this been happening consistently all day today and since?  

Reply back and let me know, I should be able to look into it further!

Summoner name: Ireliaguide2016

Posting from different account. 

I have been having these same issues continuously for the past week.

Not complaining(sorta) but just trying to be informative. Definitely not
isolated and is EXACTLY as they describe. No MS increase, no FPS increase.
Just choppy delay/lag
having same issue

I've been getting the same thing. But it isn't consistent ,it just randomly happens in games . Earlier today it happened when I was walking to lane. Yesterday it happened right before a teamfight in aram. It doesn't happen often tho and most of the time nothing is going on.

Wanted to be sure, that's why I did not answer immediately . No, is no consistently  at least not for me   . Yesterday it only happen in like 2 games  .  Today for example i exp no delay at all . But when im into the picks and bans interface sometimes it has delay and I know is not my internet because when you disconnect it appears the message " *player have left the room " "*player have join  the room " . Sorry for not giving you more info  .

Have been playing on and off all day. My second game early this afternoon started with these random freezes then teleports me to the place i last entered the command to move me too. Happens in team fights often and ruined a couple fights as well. So i left. Came back to play a couple hours ago the first game was fine. Then the last two it was back. Had to stop playing do to raging about lock ups. There is no ping issues. No FPS issues as im at a constant 250 fps plus.

Yea i am having issues as well i have been throwing skill shots that have been going through players non stop in the last few days and all looks normal but it's clearly not and of coruse not every time either. Yesterday i had games on sejuani where my bola went threw my enemy.Today the same thing with sej and fizz even his fish went threw or just stopped where the person was and never attached. this needs to be looked into if i am having shots miss like this there is no way i can play.
this has been happening for about 4 days now. fps and ping is fine but game freezes then quickly catches up with itself. I just adjust and try not to feed.

DATANNIOOOON .. same issue here . sanantonio texas. large packet losses 3 days. also from like 7-10 pm the actual ping spikes from 80-250 . however even while in game, if i ping a random ip in chicago , it comes back in 43ms ..which is my usual ping =c

Yup me too. It's been happening to a lot of people and Riot doesn't seem to be helping at all.

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

We can't say that, they have other things to handle, with just a small section of it in the Technical Support, even then Networking would comprise of a smaller department, and the player base is in the millions. Just because they haven't publicly announced the problem doesn't mean they aren't trying to look into it.

I didn't say they aren't looking into it. They just aren't really helping to fix it. All they say is to tell us to do this or that but when we tell them **over and over again** that it isn't a problem on our end, they don't listen. They don't see that it's a problem on their end and don't think its fit to send their engineers down if "there isn't a problem that they know of."

Can you prove that they haven't sent their engineers down to see if it's a problem on their end? I mean for all we know, they're currently checking out connections from their end as well. It's just that they haven't made an announcement or possibly haven't even found a solution/the problem yet.

"When it comes to widespread issues (aka issues that require more than making changes in the player's network), we're happy to send network engineers to fix the problem, but we can't send them to fix a problem until we know what the problem is. We do have monitoring, but if all of our tools are telling us everything's good to go and players are saying otherwise, we need to get more information before we can act."

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/dBMgEO6h-long-post-riot-this-lag-is-getting-to-be-unplayable?comment=000700000000

"The main issue is that, at the moment, there isn't anything for us to ask people to fix"

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/pc82EgJG-riotbok-follow-up-on-packet-loss-lag?comment=0000

They won't send engineers to even look for a problem because they don't know what it is, but since this has been happening for so long they refuse to send them just to look and see if they can find the problem, but instead they just keep asking us "to go to this troubleshooting guide" or "change this setting" when none of those help.
I've been having the same issue, it's not a spike in the ping, but packet losses throughout games, it's not consistent but it happens quite frequently ever since 6.11.

Same thing is happening to me.

When I enter a game, I end up lagging so hard, I'm teleporting places.

I know it isn't me because as soon as I restart the client, it goes back to normal.

??? 

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
Same exact thing happens to me. It's very hard to land skill shots, and it freezes and catches up; in team fights it freezes and then i see a bunch of ults, then im dead

Same here in California. Please look into this, there are many people I play with telling me about the same problem, my ping is always at around 73-75 ms, which is decent latency, and my FR hovers around 52 pretty consistently, however the game or server is lagging or something. The Red posts I see are usually about changing graphics settings, cleaning your OS to make it more efficient, or repairing the client. I have tried all of those things and it's not helping. 

Looking at the sheer number of people experiencing the same issues makes it clear that they are not on the user end. I'm not asking for an immediate fix, I just hope that Riot plans on telling us what is occurring.
Turn on Anti-aliasing and v-sync. The recent 6.10 patch turned these options off for me.

I can't help but read the thread in a Russian accent

Am I the only one?
I just made a post saying the exact same thing. Only having net issues with league too :\ . How long ago did this start for you?
